concept.title: Kafka Producer
concept.shortdesc: The Kafka Producer passes data to a Kafka cluster. The Kakfa Producer can pass data to Kafka as delimited, text, or JSON data. You can also use the Kafka Producer to create files using the SDC records format.

conbody.p: When you configure a Kafka Producer, you configure the brokers, topic, partition strategy, and data format to use. You can add additional Kafka configuration properties as needed.
The Kafka Producer passes data to partitions in the Kafka topic based on the partition strategy that you choose.
